text: Aristóbulo Iztúriz Almeida (20 December 1946 – 27 April 2021) was a Venezuelan politician and academic who was Vice President of Venezuela from January 2016 to January 2017. In 2017 Canada imposed sanctions against him. The sanctions were for behaviors that undermined democracy after 125 people were killed in the 2017 Venezuelan protests. Also at Punto de Corte and El Nacional Iztúriz died on 27 April 2021 from problems caused by heart surgery in Caracas, aged 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Venezuela Category:Deaths from surgical complications
title: Aristóbulo Istúriz
